settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your preferences and application settings
settings.organizationDescription: View and edit your organization name and logo (org_admin or super_admin).
settings.generalDescription: Customize your appearance and language preferences
settings.dashboardDescription: Configure KPI calculations and dashboard layout
settings.privacyDescription: Control AI features and data preferences
settings.currencyHint: Used for displaying financial data across the application
settings.dateFormatHint: How dates are displayed across the application. Default uses your browser language.
settings.kpiMethodsInfo: These settings control how KPI values are calculated on your dashboard. Changes will apply immediately after saving.
settings.successRateHealthDesc: Calculates success as the percentage of projects with "green" health status
settings.successRateCompletionDesc: Calculates success as the percentage of projects marked as completed
settings.budgetSpentDesc: Shows percentage of total budget that has been spent
settings.budgetRemainingDesc: Shows percentage of total budget that remains available
settings.resourceAutoDesc: Automatically calculates resource efficiency from project and team data
settings.resourceFixedDesc: Uses a fixed placeholder value until real resource data is available
settings.pushNotificationsEnableDesc: Enable notifications to stay updated on project changes
settings.pushNotificationsReceiveDesc: Receive notifications for important project updates
settings.pushNotificationsNotSupported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser.
settings.aiPrivacyInfo: AI features help you work more efficiently. Your data is processed securely and never shared with third parties.
settings.aiSuggestionsDesc: Get intelligent suggestions for project planning, risk mitigation, and resource allocation
settings.predictiveTextDesc: Enable smart text completion when writing descriptions and comments
settings.autoOptimizationDesc: Automatically optimize schedules and resource allocation based on project patterns
settings.dataEncrypted: Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit
settings.dataNotShared: Data is never shared with third parties
settings.aiProcessedSecurely: AI processing happens on secure, isolated infrastructure
